property.name: Text
property.value: Response: Save attached character from being killed, then return it to its owner's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: If there is at least 1 Dragon character in play, attached character must be chosen to satisfy [MIL] claim, if able.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached character gains +1 STR and [War] crest. While attached character is attacking, defending characters are killed if their STR is 0.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached character gains a [MIL], [INT], and [POW] icon. Response: After you win a challenge in which attached character participated, look at the top 3 cards of your deck (5 if it is Summer), put 1 into your hand, then return the others to the top of your deck, in any order.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: [Targaryen] character only.

property.name: House
property.value: Martell. Targaryen.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached character cannot be saved. Response: After you lose a challenge by 4 or more total STR, until the end of the phase, attached character gets -4 STR and is killed if its STR is 0.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Item. Crown.

property.name: Text
property.value: If the White Raven card is not in play it is Summer. Response: After you win a challenge in which attached character participated, choose an attachment. Take control of that attachment, and attach it to an eligible card of your choice.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Unique [Targaryen] character only.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Ally. Free Cities.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Kneel True-Queen's Harbinger to lower the cost of the next Dothraki or Dragon you play or put into play by 1.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Army. Mercenary.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Army. Unsullied.

property.name: Text
property.value: Limited Response: After you declare Pike Phalanx as an attacker with at least one other character with a [War] crest, raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1 until the end of the phase (Limit 1 limited Response per round).

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: after you win a challenge in which Grey Worm participated, take 1 gold token from the treasury and place it on Grey Worm. Challenges: During a challenge, discard 1 gold token from Grey Worm to choose 1 character. That character gets either -2 or +2 STR until the end of the challenge.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Army. Unsullied.

property.name: Text
property.value: No Attachments. Response: After you win a [POW] challenge, choose and discard an attachment from play.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Army. Dothraki.

property.name: Text
property.value: No Attachments. Renown. After Thundering Cavalry enter play, discard all characters with STR 1 or lower from play.

property.name: ErrataText
property.value: Should be titled: "Thundering Cavalry"

property.name: Traits
property.value: Ally. Qartheen.

property.name: Text
property.value: Blue-Lipped Warlock does not kneel to attack. Dominance: Return Blue-Lipped Warlock from your dead pile to your hand. Use this ability only if there are at least 3 characters in your dead-pile.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Ally. Qartheen.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Warlock of Qarth comes out of Shadows, choose 1 location with printed cost equal to or lower than the number of cards in Shadows. Return that location to its owner's hand.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Targaryen only. Deadly.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: During a [MIL] challenge, kneel 1 influence to put Horseback Archers into play from your hand, knelt, as an attacker or defender. Then, at the end of that phase, if Horseback Archers is in play, return it to it's owner's hand.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Targaryen only.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: after a character's STR is reduced by a card effect, stand Killer of the Wounded.

property.name: ErrataText
property.value: Should have the text: "(Limit 3 times a round.)"

property.name: Traits
property.value: Ally. Qartheen.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you win a challenge in which Pyat Pree attacked alone, instead of the normal claim effects, choose and kill a character

property.name: Traits
property.value: Creature. Dragon.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you control Drogon, attach Black Hatchling and all of its duplicates to Drogon as duplicates.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Targaryen only. No attachments. Deadly.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Creature. Dragon.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you control Rhaegal, attach Green Hatchling and all of its duplicates to Rhaegal as duplicates.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Targaryen only. No attachments.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Creature. Dragon.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you control Viserion, attach White Hatchling and all of its duplicates to Viserion as duplicates.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Targaryen only. No attachments. Stealth.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Lord. Dotrhaki

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Khal Drogo is killed, search your deck for X Dothraki characters, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck. X is Khal Drogo's STR.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Lady. Queen.

property.name: Text
property.value: Renown. Dragon characters you control do not kneel to attack

property.name: Traits
property.value: Creature. Dragon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win a challenge in which Drogon participated and all of your participating characters have the Dragon trait, choose and kill 1 character whose STR is equal to or less than the number of participating characters you control. (Limit once per phase)

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Targaryen only. No attachments. Ambush. Stealth.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Creature. Dragon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win a challenge in which Rhaegal participated and all of your participating characters have the Dragon trait, each participating character you control claims 1 power (Limit once per phase).

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Targaryen only. No attachments. Ambush. Stealth.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Creature. Dragon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win a challenge in which Viserion participated and all of your participating characters have the Dragon trait, choose and discard 1 location with a cost less than the number of participating characters you control (Limit once per phase).

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Targaryen only. No attachments. Ambush. Stealth.

property.name: Traits
property.value: The East.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Kneel Qarth to choose 1 Dragon character you control. Until the end of the phase that character gains an [INT] icon and Deadly.

property.name: Traits
property.value: The East.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Kneel Yunkai to choose 1 Dragon character you control. Until the end of the phase, that character gains Renown.

property.name: Traits
property.value: The East.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Kneel Astapor to choose 1 participating Dragon character you control. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +2 STR. If you win the challenge, stand that character.

property.name: Traits
property.value: The East.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Kneel Mereen to choose 1 participating Dragon character you control. Until the end of the phase, that character gains "Immune to opponents' triggered effects." If you win the challenge draw 1 card for each participating Dragon character you control.

property.name: Traits
property.value: The East.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Kneel Plaza of Pride to give an attacking [Targaryen] Army character you control either Stealth or Deadly until the end of the phase.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Targaryen only.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Free Cities.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Kneel 1 influence to put Myrish Villa into play from your hand Marshalling: Kneel Myrish Villa to lower the cost of the next [Targaryen] card you play this phase by 1 (by 2 instead if it is Summer).

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: Discard Summer Sea from play to reduce the cost of the next > or TARG character you play this phase by 2.

property.name: Traits
property.value: The East.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may choose to play Khal Drogo's Tent as an attachment on your House card.

property.name: ErrataText
property.value: Should be unique.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Free Cities.

property.name: Text
property.value: Limited Marshalling: Kneel Eastern Fiefdoms to lower the cost of the next TARG card you play this phase by 1. [[+1 INFLUENCE]]

property.name: Traits
property.value: Free Cities.

property.name: Text
property.value: Limited Marhalling: Kneel to lower the cost of the next TARG character you play this phase by 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Put a TARG character into play from your hand or discard pile with printed cost lower than your total initiative. At the end of the phase, if that character is still in play, return that character to its owner's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: If it is Summer, kneel 2 influence to choose all participating, non-Dragon characters. Until the end of the phase, each of those characters gets -2 STR and is killed if its STR is 0.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Targaryen only.

property.name: Text
property.value: Dominance: Kneel 1 influence to return a TARG character from your dead pile to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Dominance: Kneel Initiate of the Citadel to choose a character. Return any number of attachments on that character to their owner's hands

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Kneel High Ground to choose and stand an in-house Army character.

property.name: Traits
property.value: King's Landing.

property.name: Text
property.value: Limit 1 per deck. River Row comes into play knelt. Marshalling: Kneel River Row to lower the cost of the next character you play this phase by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: Choose and discard from play 1 Ally or Mercenary character, or up to 2 Refugee characters

property.name: Text
property.value: Dominance: Kneel 3 influence to discard all non-Limited locations from play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: Cancel the effects of an event card just played that does not have a gold or an influence cost.

property.name: Text
property.value: Before drawing your setup hand, name a House. Ignore the out-of-House gold penalty to play cards from that House. The House card of each opponent without a Treaty agenda gains: "Marshalling: Kneel this card to (choose 1): draw 1 card. or add 2 gold from the treasury to your gold pool".

property.name: ErrataText
property.value: Should read: "Ignore the out-of-House gold penalty to place or play cards from that House."

property.name: Text
property.value: Before drawing your setup hand, name [MIL] or [INT] challenge. You cannot initiate challenges of that type. You may initiate 2 [POW] challenges each challenge phase

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Targaryen only.

property.name: ErrataText
property.value: Should be: "House Targaryen only."

property.name: Traits
property.value: Intrigue Gambit.

property.name: Text
property.value: Players cannot trigger abilities on character, location, and attachment cards in play.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Power Struggle.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, look at each opponent's hand. Then choose 1 card from each of those hands and shuffle it into its owner's deck.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Military Battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: You cannot declare more than 1 challenge. You cannot declare defenders. This plot's text cannot be blanked.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, choose an opponent. Then you and that opponent each search your decks for an in-House attachment card, reveal it, and put it into your hands. Then shuffle your decks.

property.name: Text
property.value: The claim value on each opponents' revealed plot card is lowered by 1 while that opponent is attacking you.

property.name: Text
property.value: Players cannot initiate [MIL] challenges unless they control an Army character

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, you choose one: 1- Each player draws 3 cards and then discard 3 random cards from hand. 2- Each player discards 3 random cards from hand and then draws 3 cards.

property.name: ErrataText
property.value:
Should read: "When revealed, you choose one:
-Each player draws 3 cards. Each player that drew 3 cards discards 3 random cards from hand.
-Each player discards 3 random cards from hand. Each player that discarded 3 cards draws 3 cards."
